Metadata.title: AlphaWolf
Metadata.description: AlphaWolf combines cutting-edge AI with market analysis to help you create winning ad campaigns faster than ever.

hero.title: The Future of Ad Creation is Here
hero.subtitle: AlphaWolf combines cutting-edge AI with market analysis to help you create winning ad campaigns faster than ever.

features.title: All-in-One Marketing Intelligence
features.subtitle: From initial idea to performance analysis, AlphaWolf is your strategic partner.

marketAnalysis.title: Uncover Market Trends
marketAnalysis.description: Our AI wolf analyzes vast market data to reveal trending products, untapped opportunities, and potential risks.

competitorDeconstruction.title: Deconstruct Competitor Strategies
competitorDeconstruction.description: Analyze any competitor's ad or product page to understand their tactics, weaknesses, and how to outperform them.

multiFormatAds.title: Generate Multi-Format Ads
multiFormatAds.description: Instantly create complete ad concepts with compelling copy, unique AI-generated visuals, and professional audio ads.

cta.title: Ready to Revolutionize Your Ads?
cta.subtitle: Stop guessing and start creating data-driven, AI-powered campaigns that convert.

FinderPage.title: Winning Product Discovery
FinderPage.description: Let our AI analyze our ad library to identify top-performing product categories and uncover the trends driving their success. This is the ideal tool to find your next market to conquer.

TrendsPage.title: Market Trend Analysis
TrendsPage.description: Discover the most sought-after products in any category. Enter a product category and region to get an AI-driven market analysis.

form.title: Analyze Market Trends
form.description: Tell the AI which product category and region you're interested in. It will provide a market summary, trending products, and strategic advice.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: The AI leverages its vast training on public web data up to its last update. By analyzing countless articles, product listings, and consumer discussions, it identifies patterns and synthesizes information to provide strategic insights on market trends, popular products, and potential risks. It does not access real-time sales data.

SpyPage.title: Competitor Analysis
SpyPage.description: Deconstruct a specific competitor's marketing strategy. Enter their ad or product page URL to get a detailed analysis of their approach and effective counter-strategies.

form.title: Analyze a Specific Competitor
form.description: Provide a direct link to a competitor's ad or product page. The AI will deconstruct their strategy and give you ways to counter it.

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.description: The AI draws upon its vast knowledge base of public web data to identify patterns, trends, and strategic insights. It analyzes the content, structure, and likely audience of the provided URL based on information learned during its training. It does not perform live browsing or access private data.

GeneratePage.title: Ad Concept Generator
GeneratePage.description: Create high-conversion ad concepts in seconds. Provide your product details and let our AI generate compelling options for you, complete with visuals and audio.

form.title: Generate New Ad Concepts
form.description: Describe your product and target audience. The AI will generate three complete ad concepts, each with its own unique copy, visual, and audio.

VideoPage.title: Video Ad Storyboard Generator
VideoPage.description: Produce a complete, ready-to-shoot video ad storyboard. The AI will act as your director, creating a scene-by-scene plan with visuals, script, and timing.

form.title: Generate Video Storyboard
form.description: Provide product details and choose a video style. The AI will generate a title, a full storyboard with scene-by-scene visuals, a complete script, and a voiceover track.

AnalyzePage.title: Ad Performance Analysis
AnalyzePage.description: Get an AI-powered analysis of your ad creative. Upload your visual, provide the details, and receive an estimated engagement score and actionable feedback.

form.title: Analyze a New Ad
form.description: Provide the details of your ad below. The AI will analyze the copy, visual, and targeting to give you a performance estimate and suggestions for improvement.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.intro: This Privacy Policy describes Our policies and procedures on the collection, use and disclosure of Your information when You use the Service and tells You about Your privacy rights and how the law protects You.

collection.title: Collecting and Using Your Personal Data

types.title: Types of Data Collected
types.content: While using Our Service, We may ask You to provide Us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify You. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to: Email address, First name and last name, Usage Data.

usage.title: Use of Your Personal Data
usage.content: The Company may use Personal Data for the following purposes: To provide and maintain our Service, including to monitor the usage of our Service. To manage Your Account: to manage Your registration as a user of the Service.

security.title: Security of Your Personal Data
security.content: The security of Your Personal Data is important to Us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect Your Personal Data, We cannot guarantee its absolute security.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, You can contact us by email.

TermsPage.title: Terms of Use
TermsPage.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Our Service.

interpretation.title: Interpretation and Definitions
interpretation.subtitle: Interpretation
interpretation.content: The words of which the initial letter is capitalized have meanings defined under the following conditions. The following definitions shall have the same meaning regardless of whether they appear in singular or in plural.

acknowledgement.title: Acknowledgment
acknowledgement.content1: These are the Terms and Conditions governing the use of this Service and the agreement that operates between You and the Company. These Terms and Conditions set out the rights and obligations of all users regarding the use of the Service.
acknowledgement.content2: Your access to and use of the Service is conditioned on Your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms and Conditions. These Terms and Conditions apply to all visitors, users and others who access or use the Service.

links.title: Links to Other Websites
links.content1: Our Service may contain links to third-party web sites or services that are not owned or controlled by the Company.
links.content2: The Company has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party web sites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that the Company shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods or services available on or through any such web sites or services.

disclaimer.title: 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The Service is provided to You 'AS IS' and 'AS AVAILABLE' and with all faults and defects without warranty of any kind. To the maximum extent permitted under applicable law, the Company, on its own behalf and on behalf of its Affiliates and its and their respective licensors and service providers, expressly disclaims all warranties, whether express, implied, statutory or otherwise, with respect to the Service...

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Use, You can contact us by email.

FaqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqPage.description: Find answers to the most common questions about AlphaWolf and its features.

q1.question: What is AlphaWolf?
q1.answer: AlphaWolf is an all-in-one marketing intelligence suite. It's designed to be a strategic partner that uses AI to analyze market data, find winning products, spy on competitors, and generate high-impact ad concepts.

q2.question: How does the AI work?
q2.answer: The AI is powered by Google's Gemini models. It doesn't have real-time access to private data. Instead, it leverages its vast training on a large portion of the public internet. When you ask it to analyze something, it identifies patterns and synthesizes information from this knowledge base to provide intelligent deductions, much like a world-class analyst with a near-perfect memory of the web.

q3.question: Is my data private and secure?
q3.answer: Yes. When you run AlphaWolf locally, all your inputs (like competitor URLs or ad text) remain on your computer. They are only sent to the Google AI API for processing and are not stored or used for any other purpose. Your strategic work remains confidential.

GuidePage.title: AlphaWolf Guide
GuidePage.description: Your complete manual for mastering the AlphaWolf marketing suite.

philosophy.title: Core Philosophy: Think Like an Alpha Wolf
philosophy.content: An alpha wolf doesn't just react; it anticipates, strategizes, and leads the pack. AlphaWolf is built on this philosophy. It empowers you to move beyond simple e-commerce tasks and adopt a predator's mindset in the marketing landscape. Our logo, an assertive wolf's head integrating a growth chart, embodies this fusion of leadership instinct and data analysis.

howAiThinks.title: How the AI 'Thinks'
howAiThinks.content:
It's crucial to understand how AlphaWolf delivers its analysis. The AI (Google's Gemini model) doesn't have real-time access to sales data or private analytics. Its power comes from **deduction and synthesis**.

The model was trained on a vast portion of the public internet. When you ask it to analyze a trend or a competitor, it draws on this immense knowledge base to identify patterns, infer connections, and synthesize information that would take a human analyst months to compile.

In short: **AlphaWolf doesn't 'know' the answers, it intelligently 'deduces' them**, acting like a world-class analyst with a near-perfect memory of the public web.

tools.title: The Pack: Your Arsenal of Tools
tools.description: Your application is divided into several powerful modules, each designed to handle a critical phase of your marketing strategy.

dashboard.title: 🐺 The Command Center (Dashboard)
dashboard.content: This is your mission control. It provides a high-level view of the marketing landscape, with key visualizations for quick decision-making. At the top, an **AI Summary** analyzes key metrics to provide a concise overview and strategic recommendations. You can also visualize performance across platforms with **Key Stats & Engagement Charts**, including a **distribution chart** to see which platform dominates your engagement. Quick actions let you launch your next move.

finder.title: 🏆 Winning Product Discovery
finder.content: This is your digital scout. Instead of you hunting for trends, the AI hunts for you. It analyzes a vast ad database to identify top-performing product categories. It doesn't just list products; it provides an **analysis** of why they're successful and gives you **actionable advice**. A **comparative performance chart** lets you immediately visualize which categories are outperforming others.

trends.title: 📈 Market Trend Analysis
trends.content: Go beyond your current niche and explore new territories. Enter any product category and region, and the AI will provide a comprehensive market report including a **Market Summary**, a list of **Trending Products**, key **Opportunities**, and potential **Risks**.

spy.title: 🕵️ Competitor Analysis
spy.content: Deconstruct and dominate your competitors. Provide a competitor's product page or ad URL, and the AI reveals their **Product Name**, **Target Audience**, and **Marketing Angle**. It identifies their **Strengths** and **Weaknesses**, provides an **Estimated Performance Score**, and gives you a list of concrete **Counter-Strategies**.

generate.title: 🎨 Ad Concept Generator
generate.content: This is your creative engine, supercharged with multimedia capabilities. Describe your product, audience, and keywords, and the AI generates **three complete and distinct ad concepts**. Each concept includes: a **Title**, **Body Text**, a **Call to Action**, a **unique AI-generated visual**, and a professional **Audio Ad**.

analyze.title: ✨ Ad Performance Analysis
analyze.content: Get objective, AI-driven feedback on your own creative work. Upload your ad visual, provide the text and targeting information, and the AI returns an **Estimated Engagement Score**, a breakdown of its **Strengths** and **Weaknesses**, and **Suggestions for Improvement**.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started (Local Installation)
gettingStarted.intro: To run the application on your local machine, follow these steps from the root directory of your project in the Firebase Studio terminal.
gettingStarted.important: A Next.js application is a full project. You cannot start it by running a single file. You must use the `npm` commands below to start the development server that handles compiling everything.

step1.title: 1. Install dependencies (one-time)
step1.content: The `npm install` command reads the `package.json` file and installs all necessary libraries. You only need to do this step once.

step2.title: 2. Run the development server (each time)
step2.content: This command starts the application. You will need to run this every time you want to work on the app. The terminal must remain open while you use it.

gettingStarted.outro: The application will then be available at `http://localhost:9003`. Hold `Ctrl` (or `Cmd` on Mac) and click the link to open it in your browser.
